Bash(powershell -Command "& { cd D:\\supertonic; .\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c ""
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
import json
from unicodedata import normalize

# unicode_indexer 로드
with open\(''assets/onnx/unicode_indexer.json''\) as f:
    indexer = json.load\(f\)

# 전처리 시뮬레이션
text = ''한결같은 너희들의 정성이''
text = normalize\(''NFKD'', text\)
text = text + ''.''
text = ''<ko>'' + text + ''</ko>''

print\(''Preprocessed:'', repr\(text\)\)
print\(''Length:'', len\(text\)\)
print\(\)

# 인덱싱
ids = []
for ch in text:
    val = ord\(ch\)
    idx = indexer[val] if val < len\(indexer\) else -1
    ids.append\(idx\)
    if idx == -1:
        print\(f''MISSING: {ch} \(U+{val:04X}\)''\)

print\(\)
print\(''IDs:'', ids\)
print\(''Any -1?'', -1 in ids\)
"" }")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d D:\\supertonic && dir dist 2>nul || echo dist folder not found")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "cd /d D:\\supertonic && D:\\supertonic\\venv\\Scripts\\pyinstaller.exe --clean supertonic.spec > build_log.txt 2>&1 && type build_log.txt")
